io.lovelacetech.server.controller

Class CompanyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.lovelacetech.server.controller.BaseController
      • io.lovelacetech.server.controller.CompanyController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/secure/companies")
public class CompanyController
extends BaseController
    The API controller for modifying Company objects in the database

      • getCompanies

        @RequestMapping(value="/",
                method=GET)
public io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.response.company.CompanyListApiResponse getCompanies(@RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                                      io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.model.ApiUser authenticatedUser,
                                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(name="filled",defaultValue="false")
                                                                                                                                                      boolean filled)
        GET /api/secure/companies/

        Gets all the Companies in the database and returns in a list.

        RESULT: 
         {
     "status": 200,
     "message": "success",
     "response": {
         "companies": [Company]
     }
 }


        PERMISSIONS
        User must be SUPER.
        Parameters:
        authenticatedUser - User
        filled - boolean
        Returns:
        [Company]

      • getCompanyByCompanyId

        @RequestMapping(value="/byCompanyId/{companyId}",
                method=GET)
public io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.response.company.CompanyApiResponse getCompanyByCompanyId(@RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                                                                  io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.model.ApiUser authenticatedUser,
                                                                                                                                                                                  @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                  java.util.UUID companyId,
                                                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(defaultValue="false")
                                                                                                                                                                                  boolean filled)
        GET /api/secure/companies/byCompanyId/{companyId}

        Gets the Company with id "companyId"

        RESULT: 
         {
     "status": 200,
     "message": "success",
     "response": Company
 }


        PERMISSIONS
        User must either be SUPER, or must be a member of the Company with id "companyId"; That is to say, the user's companyId must match the "companyId" from the query.
        Parameters:
        authenticatedUser - User
        companyId - UUID
        filled - boolean
        Returns:
        Company

      • getCompanyForAuthenticatedUserFilled

        @RequestMapping(value="/forAuthenticated",
                method=GET)
public io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.response.company.CompanyApiResponse getCompanyForAuthenticatedUserFilled(@RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                                                                          io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.model.ApiUser authenticatedUser,
                                                                                                                                                                                          @RequestParam(defaultValue="true")
                                                                                                                                                                                          boolean filled)
        GET /api/secure/companies/forAuthenticated?filled={true|false}

        Gets the Company that the authenticatedUser is associated with. That is to say, gets the company whose id matches the user's "companyId". The "filled" parameters specifies whether or not the caller wants the Company's "locations" list populated. The population process is recursive. See LoaderUtils.

        RESULT: 
         {
     "status": 200,
     "message": "success",
     "response": Company
 }
        Parameters:
        authenticatedUser - User
        filled - boolean
        Returns:
        Company

      • getAssetTypesForCompany

        @RequestMapping(value="/assetTypes",
                method=GET)
public io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.response.asset.AssetTypeStringListApiResponse getAssetTypesForCompany(@RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                                                                 io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.model.ApiUser authenticatedUser)
        GET /api/secure/companies/assetTypes

        Returns a list of the Asset Types registered with this company. These asset types are created by Admin users.

        RESPONSE: 
         {
   "status": 200,
   "message": "success",
   "response": {
     "assetTypes": [String, String, ...]
   }
 }
        Parameters:
        authenticatedUser - User
        Returns:
        AssetTypeList

      • putCompanyForAuthenticatedUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/forAuthenticated",
                method=POST)
public io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.response.company.CompanyApiResponse putCompanyForAuthenticatedUser(@RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                                                                     io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.model.ApiUser authenticatedUser,
                                                                                                                                                                                     @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                     io.lovelacetech.server.model.api.model.ApiCompany company)
        POST /api/secure/companies/forAuthenticated

        This endpoint is to CREATE or UPDATE Companies.

        To CREATE a Company, supply the body in the following manner: 
         {
   (required) "name": ...,
   (required) "phoneNumber": ...
 }
        Once the Company is created, the calling user has their "companyId" set to the newly created Company's id, and their "accessLevel" set to ADMIN.

        To UPDATE a Company, supply the body in the following manner: 
         {
   (required) "id": ...,
   (optional) "name": ...,
   (optional) "phoneNumber": ...
 }

        RESULT: 
         {
   "status": 200,
   "message": "success",
   "response": Company
 }

        PERMISSIONS
        If the calling user is updating a Company, they must be the ADMIN for that Company. Any user is allowed to create a Company.
        Parameters:
        authenticatedUser - User
        company - Company
        Returns:
        Company
